page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: The emphasis of family life is changing perceptibly, due to the fact that many mothers now take part-time work outside the home. In most homes the day starts with breakfast and a snack meal is the usual routine at lunchtime. The main meal is eaten in the early evening and working mothers tend to rely heavily on "convenience foods". Many households keep a dog or a cat. Among the main entertainments are television, videos, radio and the music centre. The family car is extremely important for work, school and recreation.
